code: import axios from"axios";export var getContactById=function getContactById(id){return axios.get("/api/chat/contacts",{data:id});};export var getRecentContact=function getRecentContact(id){return axios.get("/api/chat/contacts/recent",{data:id});};export var getAllContact=function getAllContact(currentUserId){return axios.get("/api/chat/contacts/all",{data:currentUserId});};export var getChatRoomByContactId=function getChatRoomByContactId(currentUser,contactId){return axios.get("/api/chat/chat-room",{data:{currentUser:currentUser,contactId:contactId}});};export var deleteMessage=function deleteMessage(message){return axios.post("/api/chat/delete",message);};export var sendNewMessage=function sendNewMessage(message){return axios.post("/api/chat/add",message);};export var updateMessage=function updateMessage(message){return axios.post("/api/chat/update",message);};
